summary: HELLO,    I RECENTLY PURCHASED A USED 2003 INFINITI FX 45 FROM A PRIVATE SELLER. I NOTICED IMMEDIATELY THAT THE GAS CLUSTER READING WAS INACCURATE. I IMMEDIATELY CONTACTED MY MECHANIC AND CONDUCTED A RESEARCH TO LEARN THAT THIS IS A COMMON ISSUE WITH INFINITI MODELS FROM 03-04. I DO NOT HAVE WARRANTY AND BELIEVE AN IMMEDIATE RECALL ON THIS PART MUST BE ISSUED. THIS IS A SERIOUS MATTER AND CAN CAUSE SERIOUS ACCIDENTS ON LOCAL ROADS AND HIGHWAYS THROUGHOUT THE WORLD.     [XXX]    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR
